import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./InputPage.css';// ✅ import CSS
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InputPage=()=>{const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleUpload=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!file)return setMessage('❌ Please select a PDF file.');const formData=new FormData();formData.append('pdf',file);const userId=localStorage.getItem('userId')||'';formData.append('userId',userId);try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/flashcards/upload',{method:'POST',body:formData});const data=await res.json();if(!(data!==null&&data!==void 0&&data.flashcards)||!Array.isArray(data.flashcards)){setMessage('❌ Failed to generate flashcards');return;}// ✅ Reset old flashcards before saving new set
localStorage.removeItem('flashcards');localStorage.removeItem('speak_done');localStorage.removeItem('review_marks');// ✅ Save latest flashcards
localStorage.setItem('flashcards',JSON.stringify(data.flashcards));localStorage.setItem('flashcards_meta',JSON.stringify({uploadedAt:Date.now(),count:data.flashcards.length}));setMessage(`✅ Flashcards generated: ${data.flashcards.length}`);// ✅ Go to Review page automatically
setTimeout(()=>navigate('/review'),1000);}catch(err){console.error(err);setMessage('❌ Upload failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Upload PDF to Generate Flashcards"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleUpload,className:"input-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:".pdf",onChange:e=>setFile(e.target.files[0]||null)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Upload"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"upload-message",children:message})]});};export default InputPage;
